__e: Long ago, you betrayed and left me but, now you've come to me again, looking like this!
You were right when you said that I deceived you, and you would never do that to me 'cause you're a good person.
And that's why we misled you and told you it was written by the room.
If the lady hadn't made that decision, I would have been fooled by him.
But, if I deceived you you deceive me as well, not to mention the rest of Hollywood.
I know that's really hard to hear, 'cause he deceived me too.
Because, because, we tricked him into checking out his new room.
But then you trick me into coming here to have a beer with you... that doesn't make any sense.
I'm sorry for tricking you into marrying me while I was carrying another man's baby, and for having yet another man's baby, and for leaving you while you were in the hospital, and some other stuff...
He tricked the Major out of his apartment.
You might know how to fool the doctor, but not us.
When you see a traitor in front of your eyes, you'll know that killing isn't difficult at all.
Like he has everyone else fooled, but-- but I know.
Yeah, um... the way I deceived everyone, it's more than possible.
It happened years ago, but you lied to everyone, like now.
I already been conned by Ben once.
A man does not like to be fooled by a woman.
~ I've been cheated by you Since I don't know when ~
